response.summary:
Mechanical engineer with over five years’ experience in maintenance and project management across several industries such as plastics, consumer goods, oil & gas and power generation. High level of expertise in engineering, installation, commissioning and maintenance of industrial equipment and power generation machinery, mainly rotating equipment ensuring their reliability and availability by means of predictive, preventive, corrective, CBM and RCM methodologies.  High skilled in root cause, failure mode and numerical analysis as well as engineering calculations, teamwork and technical reporting. Specific knowledge of ISO and ASME as well as other international standards for mechanical vibrations, metrology, and mechanical design calculations.

Passionate about energy, fluid mechanics and condition monitoring of equipment and machinery. Keen on learning constantly, teamwork, reaching objectives, teaching others and contributing to people improvement.
response.skills: Eficiencia energética y conservación, Ingeniería mecánica, Mecánica de fluidos, Gestión de mantenimiento, Bombas hidráulicas, HVAC, Project Engineering, Energy Efficiency, Autodesk Inventor, AutoCAD, MATLAB, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), OpenFOAM, SAP , Microsoft Office

profile_positions.description:
-	Effectively leading the planning and execution of maintenance department projects that resulted in cost savings and the enhancement of productive processes, all while ensuring compliance with quality and HSE standards. 
-	Designing initiatives for process efficiency, equipment and process enhancement, normative compliance, and productive asset replacement projects at the conceptual, basic, and detailed engineering stages.
-	Managing and carrying out the project charter, schedules, budgets, material lists, spare parts, and equipment for the execution of maintenance projects.
-	Overseeing the negotiation and procurement of spare parts, materials, consumables, equipment, assets, installation, and maintenance services needed for project successful delivery.
-	Equipment dimensioning for maintenance project execution.
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Project Leader

profile_positions.description:
-	Planning, executing, and following up engineering projects at conceptual, basic and detailed engineering, as well as execution and closure stages, such as the main pumping system modification, which gave rise to a 60% reduction in water usage.
-	Planning maintenance activities on SAP, by means of purchase requisitions and work orders performance.
-	Supervising the installation and assembly of industrial machinery and industrial utilities equipment.
-	Managing spare parts, assets and maintenance services procurement following RCM and CBM principles for reliability and availability assurance.
-	Monitoring operational conditions of industrial utilities equipment and productive machinery by CBM techniques such as mechanical vibrations, lube oil analysis and thermography.
-	Ensuring reliability and availability of industrial utilities and power generation equipment.
-	CAD Modelling of facilities and equipment by P&ID and manufacturing drawings. 
-	Leading the company´s electromechanical maintenance technician staff (8 technicians).
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Maintenance Engineer

profile_positions.description:
-	Performing calculations for design, dimensioning and selection of pumping, gas compression and refrigeration systems, both rotary and static equipment such as pumps, pipelines, compressors, heat exchangers, chillers and pressure vessels.
-	CAD Modelling of facilities and equipment by P&ID and manufacturing drawings.
-	Supervising on-site equipment installation and commissioning, such as the successful installation and commissioning of a gas compressor in a water injection plant for an oil well.
profile_positions.title: Applications Engineer

profile_positions.description:
-	Reviewing and updating maintenance procedures and manuals
-	Following up and recording the plant’s energy and raw material usage.
-	Applying RCM approach to one of the plant´s paper impregnation machines to improve its reliability.
profile_positions.title: Process Intern

company.name: RB Plant Ltd
company.description:
Established in 1969, RB Plant have built a reputation for a high quality and responsive approach to Project Engineering, design and Management.

Our large percentage of repeat clients speaks volumes for the consistent levels of satisfaction which our clients have benefited from over the decades.

We achieve this by treating each and every client and their challenges as unique. Our bespoke, flexible and value-engineering approach results in our clients deriving the best possible return on their investment when choosing RB Plant as their partners, with a safe, efficient and reliable plant facility. 

We can provide a complete project team or individual engineers working within a client project team on a flexible basis.

RB Plant continues to grow, expanding its operations throughout the UK & Europe.

What we do:

RB Plant provides the full range of design and construction engineering services to the process industries, including:
Pharmaceutical
Biotechnology
Fine Chemicals
Food and Drink
Paper
Resins
Agrochemicals
Nuclear
Water
Minerals & Metals
Chemicals
Glass
etc.

Our Long Term Strategy:

RB Plant's success is based on establishing and valuing the long term relationships with our clients and many of which span 10 or 20 years. We are organically growing to replicate similar relationships with new clients and markets. 

Quality:

R B Plant is a quality based organisation and have been accredited to BS EN ISO 9001 since 1994 and BE EN ISO 14001 since 2015.

Safety:

R B Plant's safety record is exemplary.  We have been a member of the British Safety Council since 1995 and have received numerous safety awards from the British Safety Council and clients'​ own safety teams.

Safety is  culturally embedded within RB Plant at all levels. Our systems, processes and pro-active uncompromising approach delivers projects with an enviable no of hours worked without incidents/accidents.

Training:

R B Plant is committed to continual improvement and development of all employees.
